explains: n. 立法机关；立法机构

sentences.en: A roar of approval resounded through the legislature.
sentences.cn: 一片赞成声在议会中回响。

sentences.en: The proposals before the legislature include the creation of two special courts to deal exclusively with violent crimes.
sentences.cn: 摆在议会面前的提案包括建立两个特殊法庭专门审理暴力犯罪案件。

sentences.en: It was originally planned as a reference library for the federal legislature.
sentences.cn: 最初，它计划用来作为联邦立法机构的参考图书馆。
